title: Fifth Pink Light
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=Fish^12]]
First tale! This is my [http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/hotfish| Author Page]!
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]

[[image pinknow.png]]
@@ @@
[[image pinkpraise.png]]
@@ @@
[[image pinklove.png]]
@@ @@
[[image pinkmessage.png]]
@@ @@
[[image pinkominous.png]]
@@ @@
[[image pinkcontained.png]]
@@ @@
[[image skippiemanifesto.png]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color: #FFAEEF; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #EF8BF1 4px solid; background:#FF98FF; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
##black|...##
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image skippiehold.png width="100px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color: #FFAEEF; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #EF8BF1 4px solid; background:#FF98FF; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
##black|What a nightmare! It looks like it lasted thirty years.##

##black|I think I've had my fill of sleeping. Do I even need to sleep?##
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image skippie.png width="100px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color: #FFAEEF; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #EF8BF1 4px solid; background:#FF98FF; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
##black|Although...##

##black|Perhaps another one will do.##
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image skippieleft.png width="100px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color: #FFAEEF; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #EF8BF1 4px solid; background:#FF98FF; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
##black|Maybe the next one will be a dream.##
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image skippieexcite.png width="100px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]
